author: Siddhaai
text:
Got those orchestral chills after a while. Flutes and strings with some deep expressions.. Touching stuff 💫

Hans Zimmer has made some great soundtracks over the decades. 

https://t.co/zUL24epzFx

author: Siddhaai
text: Had thought of leaving #twitter since it's got too TOXIC lately. More so, this takeover is being made to come off as a triumph of freedom of speech... Have a feeling it's going to get even more fascist now 💣 #ElonMusk

author: Siddhaai
text:
I terms of content, Netflix suck3d from day one!

Only reason it made it this far is bc it came off as trendy to have a subscription + people were locked up at home. 

Nonetheless, RIP #Netflix ⚰️🪦☺️

author: Siddhaai
text:
It sets a rather poor example of solidarity as neighbouring #Arab states sit like spectators when #Gaza or #Palestine are b0mbed by #Israel.

All that Arab do is some social media trends & articles.

#Iran OTOH has always shown a spine & provided military support to Palestine.

author: Siddhaai
text:
Gandhi's assassination was a horrid & condemnable act of its time. Not worth a pardon.

But the event (and the assassin) has had a cult following over the decades which keeps getting justified looking at the sorry state of affairs he's put #India through.

#Gandhi
#DelhiRiots

author: Siddhaai
text:
If an international Terror Organization, with the size and capital of a huge conglomerate is issuing a direct threat and openly calling for Terror on #India, how does one expect people to react?

#AlQaeda is a sophisticated Terror Outfit that's carried out projects like the 9/11

author: Siddhaai
text:
Don't know of a heat-wave, but there's a flaring 'hate wave' across the world at the moment.

Jan 2023 until #Saturn 🪐 comes in its native sign #Aquarius. That's when the real heat wave begins🌋

The terrorists/evil shall be punished.

author: Siddhaai
text:
#Dhoni was a Legend 

#Kohli was a captain

Rohit Sharma is a cricketer.
